ygData.msgSnippet: Try www.eqnecro.com Shadoewalker lvl 28 Brell ... From: Nat Russo  To: EQ_Necromancers  Sent: Monday,

Shadoewalker

Brell
----- Original Message -----
From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
To: "EQ_Necromancers" <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2000 2:24 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Pet abilities


> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Does anyone have (or know where I can find) a comprehensive list of pet
> abilities (such as double attack, duel wield, bash, etc), with the
> corresponding spell circle at which these pets receive them?
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Mujahid 15 Necro Sol Ro
